verses.esv:
16   There are six things that the LORD hates,
    seven that are an abomination to him:
17   haughty eyes, a lying tongue,
    and hands that shed innocent blood,
18   a heart that devises wicked plans,
    feet that make haste to run to evil,
19   a false witness who breathes out lies,
    and one who sows discord among brothers.
verses.kjv: 16 These six things doth the LORD hate: yea, seven are an abomination unto him: 17 A proud look, a lying tongue, and hands that shed innocent blood, 18 An heart that deviseth wicked imaginations, feet that be swift in running to mischief, 19 A false witness that speaketh lies, and he that soweth discord among brethren.
verses.niv: 16 There are six things the LORD hates, seven that are detestable to him: 17 haughty eyes, a lying tongue, hands that shed innocent blood, 18 a heart that devises wicked schemes, feet that are quick to rush into evil, 19 a false witness who pours out lies and a man who stirs up dissension among brothers.

verses.esv: 23 Now therefore behold, the LORD has put a lying spirit in the mouth of all these your prophets; the LORD has declared disaster for you.‚Äù
verses.kjv: 23 Now therefore, behold, the LORD hath put a lying spirit in the mouth of all these thy prophets, and the LORD hath spoken evil concerning thee.
verses.niv: 23 "So now the LORD has put a lying spirit in the mouths of all these prophets of yours. The LORD has decreed disaster for you."

verses.esv: 29 They were filled with all manner of unrighteousness, evil, covetousness, malice. They are full of envy, murder, strife, deceit, maliciousness. They are gossips,
verses.kjv: 29 Being filled with all unrighteousness, fornication, wickedness, covetousness, maliciousness; full of envy, murder, debate, deceit, malignity; whisperers,
verses.niv: 29 They have become filled with every kind of wickedness, evil, greed and depravity. They are full of envy, murder, strife, deceit and malice. They are gossips,

verses.esv:
22   What is desired in a man is steadfast love,
    and a poor man is better than a liar.
verses.kjv: 22 The desire of a man is his kindness: and a poor man is better than a liar.
verses.niv: 22 What a man desires is unfailing love; better to be poor than a liar.

verses.esv: 38 For I am sure that neither death nor life, nor angels nor rulers, nor things present nor things to come, nor powers,
verses.kjv: 38 For I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come,
verses.niv: 38 For I am convinced that neither death nor life, neither angels nor demons, neither the present nor the future, nor any powers,

verses.esv: 13 Whatever you ask in my name, this I will do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son.
verses.kjv: 13 And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name, that will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son.
verses.niv: 13 And I will do whatever you ask in my name, so that the Son may bring glory to the Father.
